summary: When the gracious young Princess, Tori, trades places with her favourite singer, Keira, the girls will have to work together to save the realm of Meribella. Will the Princess and the Pop Star learn to appreciate the power of uniqueness?
cast: Kelly Sheridan|Jennifer Waris|Ashleigh Ball|Tiffany Kathryn|Ellie King|Peter Kelamis|Jonathan Holmes|Allison Warnyca|Christopher Gaze|Lauren Lavoie|Ashlyn Drummond|Adrian Petriw|Leala Selina|Michael Dobson|Ezekiel Norton|Lily Snowden-Fine|Aislyn Watson
title: Barbie: La princesa y la cantante
